metadata.name: Active Directory Computers Enumeration With Get-AdComputer
metadata.comment: Detects usage of the "Get-AdComputer" to enumerate Computers or properties within Active Directory.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM script_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 1 AND contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('get-adcomputer ')) AND (contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('-filter ')) OR contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('-ldapfilter ')) OR contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('-properties '))))

output.summary: Detects usage of the "Get-AdComputer" to enumerate Computers or properties within Active Directory.
